messages.subject: Re: People you'd temporarily change your orientation for, was Sharing Culture
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/23/2003 5:08:59 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Beth and I have talked about it, and for me, it s Jon Stewart. She doesn t have one.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/23/2003 5:08:59 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> >>I often want to ask those people whether they really believe that
> >>they could become gay if they decided to, and just how they would go
> about
> >>changing their sexual attractions.
> >
> >Well, *they* wouldn't, of course. It's all those *other* people. The
> immoral
> >ones. You know. Them.
>
> Oh right. I forgot. *They* should be able to change their sexual
> orientation, no problem . . . sigh.
> Tia
>

Beth and I have talked about it, and for me, it's Jon Stewart. She doesn't
have one.

Kathryn, who is wondering why she's starting all these naughty conversations


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
